sentences: Tulekolde kohale kookude või ahelate otsa riputati keedupajad.
Ta on nagu ahelatega kodu külge needitud.
context: The word 'vangid' is the plural form of 'vangi', meaning 'prisoners' or 'captives'. In this context, it appears in the phrase 'vangid vabastati ahelaist' which translates to 'the prisoners were freed from the chains/bonds'. The term refers to people who are imprisoned and restrained physically (chains) metaphorically (bonds).
